comments:
I am using Birt 2.0 (January 23, 2006 release).  I have an template report that has a xml datasource.  When I preview the report I get the following exception:

There are errors on the report page: 
-There are error(s) in Data : 71 
Error0 : data.engine.BirtException ( 5 time(s) )

Script engine error: TypeError: Cannot read property "length" from null Script source: null, line: 9,941, text:<compiled script>. Created an attachment (id=34780)
The xml containing the data

Created an attachment (id=34781)
The report template file

This is not a bug.

In the forth cell from left in detailed row of table, we have script?F

if ( row["msg"].length > 60 )
    row["msg"].substring(0, 60)+"...";
 else
   row["msg"];

The values of row["msg"], however, may include null values. And this leads to the exception.

The script should be corrected as follows to make report run:

if (row["msg"] != null && row["msg"].length > 60)
    row["msg"].substring(0, 60)+"...";
 else
   row["msg"];
Verified in build 20060227
